User.title: CV - Faezov
User.name: Azat Faezov
User.summary: I strive to understand the essence of the matter in order to solve the problems necessary for business.

Experience.title: Work experience
Experience.achievements-1: I was engaged in filling product catalogs for the Yandex.Market platform. During my work, I wrote JavaScript scripts that automated a significant part of the routine work of operators.
Experience.achievements-2-2: Developing a web application for monitoring the company's internal indicators. Stack: React-Redux(RTK)-TypeScript. Gained experience in corporate interaction, Agile/Jira. Translated the project from classic Redux to RTK
Experience.achievements-2-3: Developing a web application for working with a large amount of statistical information. Stack: React-MobX-TypeScript. Gained experience in organizing the architecture of a project working with a large amount of data. Carried out the typing of the main application nodes and the transfer of outdated components to TypeScript.
Experience.achievements-3: Development of a crypto exchange. Stack: NextJS-Redux-TypeScript. Experience in developing applications from scratch, integrating services for the operation of a crypto exchange, participating in the development of the backend, deploying the backend and frontend, organizing the work of a team of programmers
Experience.education-3: Faculty of Automation of Production Processes
